janus.transport.rabbitmq.name: JANUS RabbitMQ transport plugin
janus.transport.rabbitmq.author: Meetecho s.r.l.
janus.transport.rabbitmq.description: This transport plugin adds RabbitMQ support to the Janus API via rabbitmq-c.

janus.transport.http.name: JANUS REST (HTTP/HTTPS) transport plugin
janus.transport.http.author: Meetecho s.r.l.
janus.transport.http.description: This transport plugin adds REST (HTTP/HTTPS) support to the Janus API via libmicrohttpd.

janus.transport.websockets.name: JANUS WebSockets transport plugin
janus.transport.websockets.author: Meetecho s.r.l.
janus.transport.websockets.description: This transport plugin adds WebSockets support to the Janus API via libwebsockets.

janus.transport.pfunix.name: JANUS Unix Sockets transport plugin
janus.transport.pfunix.author: Meetecho s.r.l.
janus.transport.pfunix.description: This transport plugin adds Unix Sockets support to the Janus API.

janus.plugin.textroom.name: JANUS TextRoom plugin
janus.plugin.textroom.author: Meetecho s.r.l.
janus.plugin.textroom.description: This is a plugin implementing a text-only room for Janus, using DataChannels.
